name: arcana_ebook_reader
description: A simple Ebook reader which supports the most common eBook formats including EPUB, PDF, MOBI, TXT, and many others

scripts.format: flutter pub run import_sorter:main && dart format .
scripts.update:stores: flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.version:major: dart pub global run cider bump major --bump-build
scripts.version:minor: dart pub global run cider bump minor --bump-build
scripts.version:patch: dart pub global run cider bump patch --bump-build
